#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main ()
{
        int t;
        cin >> t;
        while (t--){
        int i,j;
        string str;

        cin >> str;
        //int len =  strlen(str);

        for ( i = (str.size()/2)-1; i>=0;i--){
        cout << str[i];
        }

        for ( i = (str.size())-1; i>=(str.size()/2); i--){
        cout << str[i];
        }
        cout << endl;


        }
return 0;
}
